name: The Perfect Waiter
description:
Controls

WSAD - Movement
SPACE - Rewind time
Q - Settings
Left Mouse Button - Collect food 

Objective

Wait for the plates to explode and collect everything with the space vacum cleaner. Rewind the time if you missed some objects or can't see them.

You lose in 2 cases:

1) food touches the ground
2) gun collects food from an unexploded plate

Credits

Assets - https://www.kenney.nl
Animations - https://www.mixamo.com/
Gun model - Michał
Idea - Jurek
